description: A chat application with websocket communication.
name: proact-chat

scripts.start:
pulp browserify --to dist/index.js && create-html -t "Chat" -c "https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/meyer-reset/2.0/reset.min.css" -c "https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/4.4.0/css/font-awesome.min.css" -c "https://codepen.io/jon4lvart/pen/qpmpWw.css" -s "index.js" -b "
" -o dist/index.html && node server.js
